document_data.name: ''Pouch of Accessibility''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''pouch of accessibility''''' was a [[magic item]] capable of carrying a great amount of weight.
document_data.Powers:
These mundane looking [[pouch]]es could carry up to {{SI|300|lb|k}} of weight within 30 interior compartments. No more than {{SI|10|lb|k}} of weight, or {{SI|1|cu ft|l}} of volume, could be stored in one of the compartments. To retrieve an item inside of the pouch the name of the item simply needed to be spoken aloud, causing the item to appear at the top of the pouch where it could be grabbed.

A ''pouch of accessibility'' weighed {{SI|1|lb}} when empty and only {{SI|4|lb}} if filled to capacity.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Khalid al-Karim]], a [[half-elven]] [[rawun]] from [[Zakhara]], carried a ''pouch of accessibility''.{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|479|Khalid al-Karim}}
